channel.title: Addition of a "Snippets" child board to Server Tutorials
channel.description: The title says it all, I believe this would solve a lot of issues and would gain said snippets more recognition than what they get inside the current topic they are posted inside. It'd also clean up the tutorials board from another sticky at the top of the board. I realise this would be us losing a lot of snippets, however, if they are popular and people require to be reposted I'd do as many as I could.

item.title: Addition of a "Snippets" child board to Server Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Thanks for the suggestion. It’s currently being discussed among the staff.

Read full topic
item.source: Addition of a "Snippets" child board to Server Tutorials
